LCHAN_DESC Struct Reference
[OpenAirInterface MESH L2/L3 Interfaces]

Detailed Description

MAC Logical Channel Descriptor.

Data Fields

unsigned short transport_block_size
 Minimum PDU size in bytes provided by RLC to MAC layer interface.
unsigned short max_transport_blocks
 Maximum PDU size in bytes provided by RLC to MAC layer interface.
unsigned long Guaranteed_bit_rate
 Guaranteed Bit Rate (average) to be offered by MAC layer scheduling.
unsigned long Max_bit_rate
 Maximum Bit Rate that can be offered by MAC layer scheduling.
unsigned char Delay_class
 Delay class offered by MAC layer scheduling.
unsigned char Target_bler
 Target Average Transport Block Error rate.
unsigned char LCHAN_t
 Logical Channel Type (BCCH,CCCH,DCCH,DTCH_B,DTCH,MRBCH).
